ygData.subject: Duel Weild & Sta.
ygData.msgSnippet: When I get Duel Weild I m prob. going to go with the best Mino. Batlle Axe couse it does a wooping 8dmg/35delay and with my secondary wepon I ll prob. use a
ygData.messageBody:
When I get Duel Weild I'm prob. going to go with the best Mino. Batlle Axe
couse it does a wooping 8dmg/35delay and with my secondary wepon I'll prob.
use a Fine Steel Long Sword OR a barbed whip OR a combine long sword.

P.S Could someone please tellme the specs. on the Fine Stell Long Sword,
Combine Long Sword and Barbed Whip?


How do you check my skill in sta. and how do I get that skill up.

P.S I also found that using kick often in a row draws your sta. down, but if
you use bash is dosn't seem to bring sta. down as much as kick.

I've just got Perry skill and put 3 skill points into it. Is this
automatic and I've never seen it been used. Is this skill even working and
is the skill going up?

I've just gotten Blacken Armor and replaced it with my banded and ringmail
armor! Man, the weight is so much lighter and the AC is much more better!
I suggest any lvl 12+ people go to the RiverVale area hunt though goblines
and get that armor! + is looks so cool!
